metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42705 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: A use-after-free in res_pjsip_pubsub.c in Sangoma Asterisk 16.28, 18.14,19.6, and certified/18.9-cert2 may allow a remote authenticated attacker tocrash Asterisk (denial of service) by performing activity on a subscriptionvia a reliable transport at the same time that Asterisk is also performingactivity on that subscription.

criterions.comment: asterisk package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
